timeline.bodyText: I think it works without the diamond operator too and gets cast to the generics implicitly. Can't we use that instead?
timeline.author: desokroshan

replies.bodyText: ^That will throw rawType checkstyle error IIRC
replies.author: raphkim

replies.bodyText: Ah ok, I tried it in sdk which does not have checkstyle in place
replies.author: desokroshan

replies.bodyText: Yea, that'd be a raw type; raw types cause a compiler warning usually. But we have javac warnings as errors in this project now.
replies.author: jamesonwilliams
